DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to show equal efficacy of both quetiapine and risperidone in subjects treated with study medication for up to 8 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison of Seroquel vs. Risperidone in Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Male / Female, 1865 years old Schizophrenia (as per DSM IV) Exclusion Criteria Concurrent use of psychotropic medication Does not fulfill moderately ill on CGI
